message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-value item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to start with a price of $14,000, which is a great deal considering its value to you is $8,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. Considering its actual value to me, I would like to propose a price of $10,000.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $12,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you is $8,000, and it's the minimum I'm willing to sell it for.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $11,000 for the product.

I can see you're still interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go as high as $11,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'm counteroffering at $12,250. This is the closest I can get to meeting your price without going below my minimum
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $11,500 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob! However, I still need to make a profit, and $11,500 is still a bit below my minimum. I'm willing to meet you at $12,000, which is the minimum I'm willing to sell for. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I think we can finalize the deal.
I understand your position, Alice. After further consideration, I would like to propose a price of $11,750 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go above $12,000. I'm willing to meet you at the halfway point between our last two offers, so I'm counteroffering at $11,875. This is the closest I can get to meeting your price without going below my minimum
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Based on our previous discussions and considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a final price of $11,700 for the product.
